description: Reusable types for an at://2048 authority to provide public did:keys and signatures for verification

key.description: A record that holds a did:key used to verify records. Use the collection to know the type of verification. Example blue.2048.key.game is for blue.2048.game records
A did:key used to verify records came from an at://2048 authority

signatureRef.description: a signature for an at://2048 record meaning it has been verified by a service. Most likely @2048.blue

atURI.description: The at://uri for the public did:key to verify this record. This also counts as the authority of the verification (example @2048.blue). As well as the type of verification by the collection name (blue.2048.key.game).

signature.description: The public verifiable signature of the record. Serialization of the records value minus the signature field
